outputs.style_prompt: Transform this image into an Art Nouveau style masterpiece. Emphasize the organic forms and natural motifs characteristic of this genre. Envelop the scene in flowing lines and delicate curves that blend the girl, the tiger cub, and the forest seamlessly. Use a palette of soft, earthy tones combined with rich, vibrant colors to capture the romantic and ornate aesthetics typical of Art Nouveau. Highlight the natural textures of the leaves and the fur of the cub, ensuring an intricate attention to detail, especially on the girl’s expression and attire, bringing an elaborate elegance to the entire composition.
